name: Wild Crocodile Attack 2017: Alligator Hunting 3D
description:
Wild Crocodile Attack 2017- Sniper 3D is challenging game available free on ITunes. Enter into the island of crocodiles and you are alone combat hunter. There are many Wild, hungry crocodiles and Hippos present in this island. Hunter has to defend himself from these wild crocodiles. They are ready to attack on you. Hunt them all and become a strong sniper hunter. This game contains multiple levels with increasing difficulty levels.  In Crocodile Attack 2017- Sniper 3D you are travelling on boat. In the mean while some wild Crocodiles and hippos attacking on you. Save yourself from these wild predators. Run & chase this ferocious creature target in silence and aim at them like a professional shooter and pull the trigger to kill.  You must already have played many wild animal hunting games like wolf, bear, lion and many others. This game is extreme revenge, attacking and shooting game. Hunt these wild hippos and Crocodiles before they attack, then you will be promoted to next challenging missions.  

Features: 
-Challenging missions to survive against wild predators 
-Stunning 3D graphics
  -Great Animations  
-Unique Idea
-Attractive Gameplay
